question.title: Vaadin LoginOverlay: Logo instead of Title
question.body:
I need a Logo instead of a Title in a LoginOverlay with an I18nForm. The Logo is saved in the resources/static folder as an .svg. I tried using css to get the picture in but I don't really have an idea what I am doing in css. I also tried creating an Image and adding that with the loginOverlay.setTitle(Component) method but that didn't add the picture either. I also added that you can access the File without being logged in.

private final LoginOverlay loginOverlay = new LoginOverlay();

  public LoginView() {
    this.setId("login-wrapper");
    setSizeFull();
    setAlignItems(Alignment.CENTER);
    setJustifyContentMode(JustifyContentMode.CENTER);

    LoginI18n i18n = LoginI18n.createDefault();

    LoginI18n.Header i18nHeader = new LoginI18n.Header();
    i18nHeader.setTitle("");
    i18nHeader.setDescription("description");
    i18n.setHeader(i18nHeader);

    LoginI18n.Form i18nForm = i18n.getForm();
    i18nForm.setTitle("Anmeldung");
    i18nForm.setUsername("Benutzername");
    i18nForm.setPassword("Passwort");
    i18nForm.setSubmit("Anmelden");
    i18nForm.setForgotPassword("Passwort vergessen?");
    i18n.setForm(i18nForm);

    LoginI18n.ErrorMessage i18nErrorMessage = i18n.getErrorMessage();
    i18nErrorMessage.setTitle("Benutzername oder Passwort falsch");
    i18nErrorMessage.setMessage("Bitte überprüfe deine Eingaben und versuche es erneut.");
    i18n.setErrorMessage(i18nErrorMessage);

    loginOverlay.setI18n(i18n);
    loginOverlay.setOpened(true);
    loginOverlay.getElement().setAttribute("no-autofocus", "");
    loginOverlay.setAction("login");
    loginOverlay.setForgotPasswordButtonVisible(true);

    ...

    add(loginOverlay);
  }

How to styling LoginOverlay described https://vaadin.com/docs/latest/components/login/styling overlay element - Card header
